definition: to build by laying bricks or stones
lump (of earth)/chunk/piece/classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc/(coll.) classifier for money and currency units

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research process of AAC ( Autoclaved aerated concrete)bricks exclusive interface agent.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了加气砼砌块专用界面剂的研制过程。

sentences.english: The special-shaped block and ordinary concrete block compression test and shear test were conducted.
sentences.chinese: 并设计了混凝土异型砌块砌体的抗震性能试验方案。

sentences.english: In principle , each wedge-shaped masonry block cannot fall inward without pushing the others out ;
sentences.chinese: 砌体块原则，每个楔形砌块无法向内倾圮的。

sentences.english: Office internal partitions use aerated concrete block, with thickness of 200mm in all.
sentences.chinese: 内部间隔墙均采用200厚加气混凝土砌块砌筑。

sentences.english: This paper mainly to analysis in the application of wall block civil.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要要分析墙体砌块在工民建中的应用。

sentences.english: The problem caused by scripts is that they block parallel downloads.
sentences.chinese: 脚本引起的问题是他们砌块并行下载。

sentences.english: An electro-hydraulic proportional control system is designed for the block forming machine in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种用于砌块成型机的电液比例控制系统。

sentences.english: This shows the small blocks glued to the stiffener.
sentences.chinese: 这表明，小砌块胶合板向加劲。

sentences.english: Approved hollow block wall with reinforcement to design and concrete infill.
sentences.chinese: 经批准的加固空心砌块墙设计和混凝土填充。

sentences.english: We have a microwave oven in the off-grid, straw-bale house, too.
sentences.chinese: 在离网的时候有微波灶，稻草砌块屋里也是如此。

definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
